name: Sun Moon Coin Toss (FGJ22)
description:
ggj: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/pretty-coin-toss-5

Miikka, Emmi, Dalziel

Theme: Duality

Notes: We really just wanted to explore visual theme of Sun and Moon. Coin toss was a simple enough game to work with. Elves (or Elfs, I prefer this word when they look like that) were partly inspired by FGJ22 visual theme.
